mapper.insert: insert into user_info (user_id, user_password, user_name, user_email, user_phone) values (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone})
mapper.select: select user_id as id, user_password as password, user_name as name, user_email as email, user_phone as phone, user_status as status, user_created_date as createdDate from user_info where user_id = #{value}
select user_id as id, user_password as password, user_name as name, user_email as email, user_phone as phone, user_status as status, user_created_date as createdDate from user_info
mapper.update: update user_info set user_password = #{password}, user_name = #{name}, user_email = #{email}, user_phone = #{phone} where user_id = #{id}
